cfClassScheme.cfDescr: This scheme contains CERIF vocabulary terms applicable in the cfPerson_OrganisationUnit link entity without further specification, being thus Person Organisation Roles.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, professor is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Professor" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A professor is someone who is a member of the faculty at a college or university.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, associate is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Associate" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in the e.g. cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfDef: An associate is a person with subordinate membership in a society, institution, or commercial enterprise.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, affiliation is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Affiliation" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in the cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfDef: An affiliation is a formal connection,

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, subaffiliation is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Subaffiliation" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in the cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfDef: A subaffiliation is a formal subconnection of an affiliation.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, head is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Head" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in the cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfDef: A person who is in charge

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, employee is a role e.g. in the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Employee" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in the cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfDef: A worker who is hired to perform a job

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, the member role happens e.g. within the relationships person-organisation, person-project; organisation-organisation, that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Member" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid), and reused with e.g. the cfPerson_OrganisationUnit; cfProject_Person; cfOrganisationUnit_OrganisationUnit relationships. A person can be a member of multiple organisations. An organization can be a member of another organization, or a state that belongs to a group of nations.
cfClass.cfDef: A member is anything that belongs to a set or class.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, director is e.g. a role in the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Director" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in e.g. the cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfDef: A director is someone who controls resources and expenditures

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, deputy director is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Deputy Director" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in e.g. the cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfDef: A deputy director is a person appointed to represent or act on behalf of the director

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, dean is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Dean" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in e.g. the cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfDef: A dean is an administrator in charge of a division of a university or college.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, principle is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Principle" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in e.g. the cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfDef: A principle is a person who empowers another to act as his or her representative; The person having prime responsibility for an obligation as distinguished from one who acts as surety or as an endorser. (law)

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, head of department is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Head of Department" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in the e.g. cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfDef: A head of department is a person who is in charge of a specialized division of a large organization.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, group leader is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Group Leader" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in the e.g. cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfDef: A group leader is a person who rules or guides or inspires others or any number of entities (members) considered as a unit.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, the manager role happens e.g. within the relationships person-organisation or person-project; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Manager" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid), and reused with the e.g. cfPerson_OrganisationUnit or cfProject_Person relationships.
cfClass.cfDef: A manager is someone who controls resources and expenditures.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, spokesperson is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Spokesperson" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in the e.g. cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfDef: A spokesperson is an advocate who represents someone else's policy or purpose.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, fellow is a role in the e.g. person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Fellow" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in the e.g. cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfDef: A fellow is a member of a learned society.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, reviewer is a role in the e.g. person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Reviewer" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in the e.g. cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfDef: A reviewer is someone who reads manuscripts and judges their suitability for publication.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, contractor is a role in the e.g. person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Contractor" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in the e.g. cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfEx: An organisation contracted to undertake a specific bounded (time and specification) subset of an activity. Normally such an organisation would not retain an interest in any IP generated from the activity.
cfClass.cfDef: A contractor is someone (a person or firm) who contracts to build things, (law) a party to a contract.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, contractor is a role in the e.g. person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Contractor" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in the e.g. cfPerson_OrganisationUnit entity.
cfClass.cfDef: A subcontractor is someone who enters into a subcontract with the primary contractor.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, contractor is a role in the e.g. person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Contractor" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in e.g. the cfPerson_OrganisationUnit or cfProject_Person link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A person who uses scientific knowledge to solve practical problems.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, secretary is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Secretary" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A secretary is a person who is head of an administrative department of government, an assistant who handles correspondence and clerical work for a boss or an organization

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, researcher is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Researcher" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A researcher is a scientist who devotes himself to doing research (Wordnet). Permanent research, non-teaching staff (RMAS Project).

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, junior researcher is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Junior Researcher" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A junior researcher is a scientist who devotes himself to doing research but younger; lower in rank; shorter in length of tenure or service

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, senior researcher is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Senior Researcher" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A senior researcher is a scientist who devotes himself to doing research and is older; higher in rank; longer in length of tenure or service

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, consultant is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Consultant" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A consultant is an expert who gives advice.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, junior consultant is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Junior Consultant" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A junior consultant is an expert who gives advice and that is younger; lower in rank; shorter in length of tenure or service.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, senior consultant is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Senior Consultant" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A senior consultant is an expert who gives advice that is older; higher in rank; longer in length of tenure or service.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, lecturer is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Lecturer" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A lecturer is someone who lectures professionally, a public lecturer at certain universities.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, junior lecturer is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Junior Lecturer" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A junior lecturer is someone who lectures professionally, a public lecturer at certain universities and is younger; lower in rank; shorter in length of tenure or service.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, senior lecturer is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Senior Lecturer" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A senior lecturer is someone who lectures professionally, a public lecturer at certain universities and is older; higher in rank; longer in length of tenure or service.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, guest lecturer is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Guest Lecturer" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A guest lecturer is someone who lectures professionally, a public lecturer at certain universities and is a visitor to whom hospitality is extended.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, assistant professor is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Assistant Professor" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: An assistant professor is a university teacher lower in rank than an associate professor.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, honorary professor is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Honorary Professor" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: An honorary professor is given an honor without the normal duties of a professor, someone who is a member of the faculty at a college or university.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, visiting professor is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Visiting Professor" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A visiting professor is in the activity of a professor making visits.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, doctor (med) is a role in the e.g. person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Doctor (med)" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A doctor (med) is a licensed medical practitioner.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, research fellow is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Research Fellow" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: The title of research fellow is used to denote a research position at a university or similar institution, usually for academic staff or faculty members. A research fellow may act either as an independent investigator or under the supervision of a principal investigator.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, postdoc is a role in the e.g. person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Postdoc" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A PostDoc is a scholar or researcher who is involved in academic study beyond the level of a doctoral degree

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, phd is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "PhD" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfEx: Doctor of Philosophy, abbreviated to PhD, or Ph.D. in English-speaking countries, for the Greek διδάκτωρ φιλοσοφίας (Latin philosophiae doctor). Here φιλοσοφία/philosophy, literally translating tο "the love of wisdom", is used in the original Greek sense, loosely meaning "the pursuit of in depth knowledge" and does not refer to the scientific field philosophy.
cfClass.cfDef: A Phd or doctor's degree; doctorate is usually based on at least 3 years graduate study and a dissertation; the highest earned academic degrees conferred by a university.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, research assistant is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Research Assistant" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A research assistant (in some institutions referred to as research officer) is a researcher employed, often on a temporary contract,[1] by a university or a research institute, for the purpose of assisting in academic research. Research assistants are not independent and not directly responsible for the outcome of the research and are responsible to a supervisor or principal investigator. Research assistants are often educated to degree level[2] and might be enrolled in a postgraduate degree programme. Although a research assistant is normally appointed at graduate level, so-called undergraduate research assistant are also sometimes appointed to support research. Similarly a postdoctoral research assistant who has recently been awarded a doctoral degree, may hold a temporary appointment as a research assistant, especially for position without any autonomy and research independence that requires a high degree of reliability.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, reader is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Reader" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A reader is a public lecturer at certain universities.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, teaching fellow is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Teaching Fellow" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A teaching fellow is a particular teaching role at some universities. In the USA a teaching fellow is an advanced graduate student who serves as the primary instructor for an undergraduate course. In the UK, teaching fellows are more commonly full members of academic staff who have the equivalent rank and pay as 'traditional' research-active academic staff.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, teaching assistant is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "teaching assistant" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A teaching assistant is an individual who assists a professor or teacher with instructional responsibilities.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, casual is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Casual" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: A caual is a person without or seeming to be without plan or method.

cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, expert is a role in e.g. the person-organisation relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Expert" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: An expert is a person with special knowledge or ability who performs skillfully.

cfClass.cfTermSrc: CERIF Task Group; CIA project; RMAS Project
cfClass.cfDescr: In CERIF terms, contributor is a role in e.g. the person-project relationship; that is, the classification term (cfTerm) "Contributor" identified by its cfClassificationIdentifier (a uuid) and reused in link entities.
cfClass.cfDef: Person contributing (in a generic way) before/during/after an event. An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.
